item.title: [PI] How to add anti dupe [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Teemo Teemo
item.description:
@Teemo wrote:

Description: Making nothing appear on the ground when you drop something, aka ‘Anti Dupe’

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and paste

Tested Server: InfectionX

Files/Classes Modified: Clickingmost.java, Client.java

Step 1:
Open your client.java and search for case 87:
Replace your case 87: with this one

[code]case 87:
// drop item
int droppedItem = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

		somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedByte()
				+ inStream.readUnsignedByte();
		int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
            RemoveAllWindows();
			//println_debug("dropItem: "+droppedItem+" Slot: "+slot);                    
        outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
        outStream.writeWord(14171);
        outStream.writeByte( 0);
        outStream.writeWord(droppedItem + 1);
        outStream.writeByte(255);
        outStream.writeDWord(1);
        outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
        sendFrame126("Are you sure you want to destroy this object?", 14174);
        sendFrame126("Yes.", 14175);
        sendFrame126("No.", 141756);
        sendFrame126(""+GetItemName(droppedItem), 14184);
        sendFrame126(getMessageA(droppedItem),14182);
        sendFrame126(getMessageB(droppedItem),14183);
        sendFrame164(14170);
	//dropItem(droppedItem, slot);
       publicDroppendItem = droppedItem;
            break;[/code]

Close client.java and open Clickingmost.java

Step 2:

Search for case 55095: and replace case 55095 AND 55096 with this cases:

case 55095://yes (destroy item) c.deleteItem(c.publicDroppendItem, c.getItemSlot(c.publicDroppendItem), 2147000000); c.closeInterface(); break; case 55096://no (destroy item) c.closeInterface(); break;

Close clickingmost.java and Compile and you should not be able to see anything on the ground when players try to drop somthing, this is good for drop trade and the tele grab dupe.

I hope it worked for you If you had any problems with it? post your problem here and I’ll will be glad to help you.

Read full topic
